US-DC00C5F8.title: Jira API Authentication and Connection
US-DC00C5F8.description: As a developer, I want to authenticate and establish a secure connection with Jira, so that Xavier can communicate with Jira API
US-DC00C5F8.i_want: to authenticate and establish a secure connection with Jira
US-DC00C5F8.so_that: Xavier can communicate with Jira API

US-E0F687B6.title: Jira Webhook Integration for Real-time Story Sync
US-E0F687B6.description: As a product manager, I want Xavier to automatically receive Jira webhook notifications, so that new Jira stories are instantly synchronized
US-E0F687B6.i_want: Xavier to automatically receive Jira webhook notifications
US-E0F687B6.so_that: new Jira stories are instantly synchronized

US-2DDB3C5C.title: Bi-directional Story Synchronization
US-2DDB3C5C.description: As a project manager, I want stories from Jira to automatically appear in Xavier, so that I can manage from either system seamlessly
US-2DDB3C5C.i_want: stories from Jira to automatically appear in Xavier
US-2DDB3C5C.so_that: I can manage from either system seamlessly

US-07CE3895.title: Automatic Task Creation from Jira Stories
US-07CE3895.description: As a developer, I want Xavier to auto-create tasks from Jira stories, so that I have ready work breakdown
US-07CE3895.i_want: Xavier to auto-create tasks from Jira stories

US-577F88A9.title: Task Synchronization to Jira
US-577F88A9.description: As a developer, I want Xavier tasks synced to Jira as sub-tasks, so that stakeholders see detailed breakdown
US-577F88A9.i_want: Xavier tasks synced to Jira as sub-tasks

US-E6366874.title: Git Worktree Branch Naming Convention
US-E6366874.description: As a developer, I want worktree branches to follow Jira naming, so that branches link to Jira stories automatically
US-E6366874.i_want: worktree branches to follow Jira naming
US-E6366874.so_that: branches link to Jira stories automatically

US-B31AA17C.title: Bi-directional Status Synchronization
US-B31AA17C.description: As a project manager, I want status changes to sync both ways, so that everyone has real-time visibility
US-B31AA17C.i_want: status changes to sync both ways

US-7C529F14.title: Jira Workflow State Mapping
US-7C529F14.description: As a developer, I want Xavier statuses to map to Jira workflows, so that transitions respect both systems
US-7C529F14.i_want: Xavier statuses to map to Jira workflows

US-9CE7E70D.title: Jira Configuration Management
US-9CE7E70D.description: As a team lead, I want configuration interface for Jira integration, so that I can customize to match team workflows
US-9CE7E70D.so_that: I can customize to match team workflows

US-C98A6D35.title: Error Handling and Sync Conflict Resolution
US-C98A6D35.description: As a developer, I want clear errors and conflict resolution, so that I can quickly fix sync issues
US-C98A6D35.so_that: I can quickly fix sync issues
